pageTitle: Only use this grant for support worker costs
h1: You can only use this grant to help cover support worker costs
p1: Contact the Access to Work team if you think we've got something wrong, or you think you need extra support from your Access to Work grant.
p2: You can contact us for free by:
relayLinkText: Relay UK, if you cannot hear or speak on the phone: 18001 then 0800 121 7479
checkYouCanUseLinkText: find out how to use the service
breadcrumbs3: Your Access to Work grant can only be used to help pay for support worker costs
